tool_description: Filters activities based on seasonal appropriateness, weather considerations, and time-of-year relevance for optimal learning engagement.

activity_ids.description: List of activity IDs to filter by season

target_season.description: Target season: spring, summer, fall, or winter

climate_region.description: Climate region: temperate, tropical, arid, or polar

include_indoor.description: Whether to include indoor activities that are season-neutral

error_messages: Empty activity list: At least one activity ID must be provided.
Invalid season: target_season must be one of [spring, summer, fall, winter].
Invalid climate: climate_region must be one of [temperate, tropical, arid, polar].
Activity not found: One or more activity IDs are not recognized.
usage: Provide activity IDs and target season for seasonal filtering. Optionally specify climate region and whether to include indoor activities.

seasonal_activities.description: Activity IDs that are appropriate for the specified season

year_round_activities.description: Activity IDs that are appropriate year-round

seasonal_themes.description: Seasonal themes represented in the filtered activities

weather_considerations.description: Weather-related considerations for the seasonal activities
